title: Deep Piano Focus - 25 Min Piano Music for Deep Work | Pravos Sessions
description:
Experience Deep Piano Focus - a 25-minute piano-driven journey designed for focused attention and creative work.

Part of Pravos (www.pravos.xyz), the focus workspace I built to solve my own productivity fragmentation. No more juggling Spotify, a timer app, and a separate to-do list. Just one clean interface for deep work.

Each album follows a deliberate arc: grounding, building, peaking, releasing. It's inspired by ecstatic dance - enough structure to support your focus, never enough to distract from the work.

Try Pravos: www.pravos.xyz
